delivery.title: Delivery and Payment

payment.title: Payment by Payment Document
payment.description: When signing the contract, you will be issued an invoice and a payment document will be sent to your email. With this document, you can pay for your order through the bank and receive the goods in the near future.

pickup.title: Self-pickup
pickup.description: Can be made from the warehouse in Moscow at the address: Volokolamskoye Highway 1, building 1. The warehouse operates daily from 8:30 AM to 5:00 PM. To place an order and pick it up yourself, contact our company's managers at: +7 (499) 678-82-35.

delivery.title: Delivery to the Transport Company Terminal
delivery.description: Delivery to the terminals of the transport company 'Delovye Linii' is at our expense. For orders over 500,000 tenge, delivery to the nearest terminal of the transport company to the Customer is free of charge. Delivery within Astana is free for orders over 200,000 tenge. If desired, the shipment can be made by a transport company convenient for you.

delivery.contact: Contact Us to Place an Order

about.title: About the company
about.description: ARG company – your reliable partner in the supply of industrial tools and equipment. We offer a wide range of products from leading global manufacturers, guaranteeing quality, reliability, and competitive prices.
about.mission: To provide enterprises with high-quality tools and components, improving their operational efficiency.
about.advantage1: Over 10 years in the industrial supply market.
about.advantage4: Flexible cooperation terms and prompt delivery.

aboutPage.title: About ARG Company
aboutPage.subtitle: Your Reliable Partner in Industrial Tools and Equipment
aboutPage.historyContent: ARG was founded with a vision to provide high-quality industrial tools and equipment to businesses across the region. Since our establishment, we have been committed to delivering exceptional products and services to our clients.
aboutPage.historyContent2: Over the years, we have grown to become a trusted supplier of industrial tools, establishing partnerships with leading manufacturers worldwide and building a reputation for reliability and expertise.
aboutPage.missionContent: Our mission is to provide businesses with access to the best industrial tools and equipment, enabling them to operate efficiently and effectively. We strive to be a reliable partner that contributes to the success of our clients through quality products and exceptional service.
aboutPage.visionContent: We envision becoming the leading supplier of industrial tools and equipment in the market, recognized for our commitment to quality, innovation, and customer satisfaction.
aboutPage.advantage1: We offer only high-quality tools and equipment sourced from reputable manufacturers around the world.
aboutPage.advantage2: Our team of experienced professionals provides expert advice to help you find the right tools for your specific needs.
aboutPage.advantage3: We provide comprehensive support services to ensure your equipment operates at optimal performance levels.
aboutPage.advantage4: Our efficient logistics system ensures prompt delivery of your orders, minimizing downtime for your business.
aboutPage.teamIntro: At ARG, our success is driven by our dedicated team of professionals who are committed to delivering excellence in everything we do.
aboutPage.ctaText: Contact our team today to discuss how we can help you find the right tools and equipment for your business needs.

company.title: WURTH Company
company.description: LLP 'Würth-Kazakhstan' was founded by the Würth concern in 1996 in Almaty and supplies products to customers throughout Kazakhstan. It has branches and warehouses in Astana, Atyrau, Aktobe, Aktau, Pavlodar, Karaganda, Shymkent, and Tengiz.
company.assortment_intro: The Wurth assortment includes over 100,000 items of tools, consumables, components, and equipment for installation, maintenance, and repair.

assortment.title: The range of supplied products includes:

items.liquids: Automotive technical fluids: motor, hydraulic, transmission oils, coolants, brake fluids, etc.
items.chemical_products: Chemical-technical products: cleaning, washing, disinfecting agents, removers, adhesives for various materials, modifiers, silicones, sealants, etc.
items.measurement_tools: Measuring instruments: levels, laser measuring devices, geodetic instruments, protractors, measuring tapes, calipers, multimeters, thickness gauges, and other measuring tools.
items.storage_systems: Storage systems: racks, boxes, plastic and metal containers, packaging systems, packing films, marking systems, layout application devices, etc.
items.welding_equipment: Welding accessories: spot welding machines, electric welding guns for body shops, welding templates, hammers, protective masks, goggles, welding gloves, gas welding kits, regulators, etc.

company.title: McMaster-Carr Company
company.description: McMaster-Carr is a leading supplier of industrial and engineering solutions with over a century of experience. The company offers a wide range of products, including fasteners, tools, piping, electrical equipment, and more.
company.assortment_intro: Founded in 1901, McMaster-Carr has become a trusted partner for engineers, mechanics, and businesses worldwide, providing fast delivery and high-quality products.

items.fasteners: Fasteners: screws, nuts, bolts, washers, and anchors.
items.tools: Tools: hand tools, power tools, and specialized instruments.
items.pipe_fittings: Pipes and fittings: pipes, valves, connectors.
items.electrical: Electrical equipment: cables, lighting, industrial connectors.
items.safety: Safety equipment: protective gear, signal systems, safety signs.

company.title: Roebuck Company
company.description: Roebuck is a leading supplier of professional hand tools and industrial solutions. The brand is part of Cromwell and is known for its high quality, reliability, and durability.
company.assortment_intro: Roebuck offers a wide range of tools designed for mechanics, engineers, and maintenance professionals.

items.hand_tools: Hand tools: screwdrivers, wrenches, pliers, side cutters.
items.power_tools: Power tools: cordless drills, grinders, impact wrenches.
items.cutting_tools: Cutting tools: saws, hacksaws, metal shears.
items.tool_storage: Tool storage: metal boxes, tool trolleys, workbenches.
items.safety_gear: Safety gear: work gloves, safety glasses, helmets.

company.title: Eclipse Company
company.description: Eclipse is a globally recognized manufacturer of professional hand tools, specializing in innovative solutions for cutting, clamping, and securing. With over 100 years of history, the company provides high-quality tools for industries such as metalworking, woodworking, and construction.
company.assortment_intro: Eclipse offers a wide range of hand tools, ensuring reliability and high performance for professionals.

items.cutting_tools: Cutting tools: hacksaws, metal cutting blades, pipe cutters.
items.clamping_tools: Clamping tools: vices, clamps, quick-release mechanisms.
items.saw_blades: Saw blades: blades for band saws and hand saws.
items.specialty_tools: Specialty tools: magnetic holders, center punches, hole punches.

company.title: GISS CUTLINE Company
company.description: GISS CUTLINE is a leading manufacturer of high-precision cutting tools for metalworking, woodworking, and construction. The company offers a wide range of drills, milling cutters, hole saws, and other tools for precise and efficient cutting.
company.assortment_intro: GISS CUTLINE products are known for their quality, durability, and high performance in professional and industrial applications.

items.milling_tools: Milling cutters: end mills, disc mills, form milling cutters.
items.hole_saws: Hole saws: for metal, wood, composite materials.
items.boring_tools: Boring tools: adjustable heads, drill chucks.
items.threading_tools: Threading tools: taps, dies, thread cutting heads.

company.title: GATES Company
company.description: GATES is a global leader in the production of drive belts, hydraulic hoses, and power transmission solutions. The company provides innovative and reliable solutions for various industries, including automotive, industrial, agricultural, and construction.
company.assortment_intro: GATES products ensure long service life, high performance, and reliability in the most demanding operating conditions.

items.drive_belts: Drive belts: V-belts, multi-ribbed belts, timing belts.
items.hydraulic_hoses: Hydraulic hoses: high-pressure, low-pressure, heat-resistant hoses.
items.power_transmission: Power transmission systems: pulleys, couplings, tensioners.
items.cooling_systems: Cooling system components: thermostats, water pumps, hoses.
items.industrial_solutions: Industrial solutions: conveyor belts, reinforced hoses, specialty equipment belts.

company.title: Continental Company
company.description: Continental is a global leader in the production of tires, rubber products, and automotive components. The company offers innovative solutions for vehicles, enhancing safety, efficiency, and comfort.
company.assortment_intro: Continental products are widely used in automotive, industrial, and agricultural applications, ensuring reliability and durability.

items.tires: Tires: for passenger cars, trucks, special equipment, and agricultural machinery.
items.hoses: Rubber products: hoses for cooling systems, hydraulics, and fuel applications.
items.drive_belts: Drive belts: V-belts, timing belts, multi-ribbed belts for various applications.
items.automotive_components: Automotive components: braking systems, suspension, shock absorbers.
items.industrial_solutions: Industrial solutions: rubber coatings, conveyor belts, high-pressure hoses.

company.title: Optibelt Company
company.description: Optibelt is one of the world's leading manufacturers of drive belts and power transmission solutions. The company provides products that meet the highest standards of quality, reliability, and durability.
company.assortment_intro: Optibelt products are widely used in industry, automotive, agriculture, and mechanical engineering, ensuring efficient power transmission.

items.v_belts: V-belts: standard, reinforced, and high-temperature models.
items.timing_belts: Timing belts: for synchronous drives in industry and automotive applications.
items.poly_v_belts: Poly V-belts: for energy-efficient torque transmission.
items.special_belts: Special belts: for heavy-duty applications and custom solutions.
items.power_transmission: Power transmission systems: pulleys, couplings, rollers, and related components.

company.title: Dunham-Bush Company
company.description: Dunham-Bush is one of the world's leading manufacturers of heating, ventilation, and air conditioning (HVAC) systems. The company is known for its innovative solutions and energy-efficient technologies.
company.assortment_intro: Dunham-Bush offers a wide range of equipment for commercial, industrial, and residential applications, providing reliable and efficient climate control.

items.air_handling: Air handling units: ventilation and air conditioning systems.
items.heat_pumps: Heat pumps: efficient solutions for heating and cooling.
items.compressors: Compressors: reciprocating, screw, and centrifugal models.
items.fan_coils: Fan coils: compact and high-efficiency air conditioning units.

company.title: Ametek Crystal Company
company.description: Ametek Crystal Engineering is a leading developer and manufacturer of high-precision instruments for pressure calibration and process measurement. The company provides innovative solutions for the oil & gas, aviation, and other industrial sectors.
company.assortment_intro: Ametek Crystal products include a wide range of instruments for precise measurement and pressure control, ensuring reliability and accuracy in the most demanding environments.

items.pressure_calibrators: Pressure calibrators: high-precision portable and stationary devices.
items.pressure_gauges: Pressure gauges: digital and analog devices for measuring pressure.
items.hose_fittings: Hose and fittings: connectors for hydraulic systems.
items.test_equipment: Test equipment: kits for system inspection and diagnostics.
items.process_instruments: Process instruments: tools for monitoring and controlling industrial processes.

company.title: Aflex Hose Company
company.description: Aflex Hose is a leading manufacturer of flexible PTFE-coated hoses for various industrial applications. The company provides innovative solutions for the chemical, pharmaceutical, food, and other industries, ensuring durability and reliability of its products.
company.assortment_intro: Aflex Hose offers a wide range of high-quality flexible hoses designed to operate in aggressive environments and under high pressure.

items.ptfe_hoses: PTFE hoses: resistant to chemical exposure and high temperatures.
items.smoothbore_hoses: Smoothbore hoses: for medical and pharmaceutical applications.
items.corrugated_hoses: Corrugated hoses: flexible and durable solutions for demanding environments.
items.reinforced_hoses: Reinforced hoses: enhanced strength for high-pressure applications.
items.custom_hoses: Custom solutions: tailored configurations for unique client needs.

company.title: Parker Company
company.description: Parker Hannifin is a global leader in hydraulic, pneumatic, and motion control solutions. The company provides advanced technologies for various industries, including engineering, aerospace, oil and gas, and automotive sectors.
company.assortment_intro: Parker's product range includes a wide variety of components and systems for motion control, as well as fluid and gas handling.

items.hydraulic_systems: Hydraulic systems: pumps, valves, cylinders, filters.
items.fluid_connectors: Fluid connectors: hydraulic and pneumatic fittings, hoses.
items.filtration_systems: Filtration systems: liquid, air, and gas filters.

company.title: STATS Group Company
company.description: STATS Group is a leading global provider of pipeline maintenance, repair, and isolation solutions for the oil and gas industry. The company specializes in advanced pipeline isolation, pressure, and flow control technologies.
company.assortment_intro: STATS Group delivers innovative solutions to minimize downtime, enhance safety, and improve pipeline maintenance efficiency.

items.pipeline_isolation: Pipeline isolation systems: temporary and permanent isolators, flow blocking systems.
items.hot_tapping: Hot tapping technologies: equipment for connecting to live pipelines without flow interruption.
items.welding_interventions: Welding intervention systems: tools for isolating welded joints.
items.testing_solutions: Testing solutions: hydrostatic testing, pressure tests.
items.emergency_response: Emergency response solutions: mobile systems for rapid damage containment.

company.title: Knowsley SK Company
company.description: Knowsley SK is a leading manufacturer of fire suppression systems and firefighting equipment for various industries. The company specializes in developing innovative solutions to protect people and infrastructure from fire hazards.
company.assortment_intro: Knowsley SK offers advanced fire suppression systems that provide reliable protection for industrial sites, offshore platforms, and energy facilities.

items.fire_nozzles: Fire nozzles: adjustable and fixed nozzles for optimal water and foam distribution.
items.foam_systems: Foam systems: foam generators, proportioning systems, and storage tanks.
items.fire_monitors: Fire monitors: stationary and mobile systems for large-scale fire suppression.
items.fire_suppression: Fire suppression systems: automated installations for building and equipment protection.
items.hose_reels: Fire hose reels: reliable solutions for quick and effective water delivery.

company.title: Kuriyama Company
company.description: Kuriyama is a leading manufacturer of industrial hoses, fittings, and components for various industries. The company provides high-quality solutions for agriculture, petrochemicals, food processing, and more.
company.assortment_intro: Kuriyama offers a wide range of industrial hoses and connectors to ensure reliability and safety in operations.

items.industrial_hoses: Industrial hoses: rubber, PVC, and polyurethane hoses for various applications.
items.fittings: Fittings and connectors: a wide range of adapters, couplings, and clamps.
items.hydraulic_systems: Hydraulic systems: high-pressure hoses, reinforced tubing, and connectors.
items.specialty_hoses: Specialty hoses: corrosion-resistant, food-grade, and chemically resistant hoses.
items.safety_equipment: Safety equipment: accessories and components for safe hose operation.

company.title: FAG Company
company.description: FAG is a leading manufacturer of bearings and components for mechanical engineering, automotive, and aerospace industries. As part of the Schaeffler Group, the company is known for its innovative bearing technology solutions.
company.assortment_intro: FAG offers a wide range of high-precision bearings and friction management systems, ensuring durability and reliability in machinery operations.

items.ball_bearings: Ball bearings: radial, thrust, single-row, and multi-row models.
items.roller_bearings: Roller bearings: cylindrical, tapered, and spherical variants.
items.plain_bearings: Plain bearings: long-lasting solutions for various industries.
items.automotive_bearings: Automotive bearings: solutions for engines, transmissions, and chassis.
items.industrial_solutions: Industrial solutions: bearing units, lubrication, and monitoring systems.

company.title: SKF Company
company.description: SKF is one of the world's leading manufacturers of bearings, seals, lubrication systems, and friction management solutions. Founded in 1907 in Sweden, the company has been providing innovative solutions for industrial and automotive applications.
company.assortment_intro: SKF delivers advanced technologies and reliable solutions to improve efficiency and durability in various industries.

items.ball_bearings: Ball bearings: radial, thrust, single-row, and multi-row models.
items.roller_bearings: Roller bearings: cylindrical, tapered, and spherical variants.
items.seals: Seals: oil, hydraulic, pneumatic, and high-temperature solutions.
items.lubrication_systems: Lubrication systems: centralized systems and accessories to extend machinery lifespan.
items.condition_monitoring: Condition monitoring systems: vibration sensors, diagnostics, and analytics for predictive maintenance.

company.title: NSK Company
company.description: NSK is a leading manufacturer of bearings, linear motion systems, and automotive components. Founded in 1916 in Japan, the company is known for its high-tech solutions for industrial and automotive applications.
company.assortment_intro: NSK offers a wide range of products designed to enhance efficiency, precision, and durability in various applications.

items.ball_bearings: Ball bearings: radial, thrust, angular contact, and self-aligning models.
items.roller_bearings: Roller bearings: cylindrical, tapered, and spherical bearings.
items.linear_motion: Linear motion systems: guides, ball screws, and actuator modules.
items.automotive_parts: Automotive components: wheel hub units, steering systems, and transmission bearings.
items.machine_components: Machine components: precision spindle bearings, electric motor units.

company.title: NACHI Company
company.description: NACHI is a leading Japanese manufacturer of bearings, cutting tools, hydraulic components, and robotic systems. Founded in 1928, the company provides innovative solutions for the industrial and automotive sectors.
company.assortment_intro: NACHI offers advanced technologies and products that ensure reliability, efficiency, and high performance.

items.ball_bearings: Ball bearings: radial, thrust, angular contact, and miniature models.
items.roller_bearings: Roller bearings: cylindrical, tapered, spherical, and needle bearings.
items.cutting_tools: Cutting tools: milling cutters, drills, turning inserts, and special tools.
items.hydraulics: Hydraulic components: pumps, valves, cylinders, and control systems.
items.industrial_robots: Industrial robots: robotic manipulators and automated production solutions.

company.title: NTN Company
company.description: NTN is one of the world's leading manufacturers of bearings, transmission systems, and linear motion products. Founded in 1918 in Japan, the company has established itself as a provider of high-quality solutions for various industries.
company.assortment_intro: NTN products are known for their reliability, durability, and innovative technology, making them essential in the automotive, aerospace, energy, and machinery sectors.

items.ball_bearings: Ball bearings: radial, thrust, angular contact, and miniature models.
items.roller_bearings: Roller bearings: cylindrical, tapered, spherical, and needle bearings.
items.wheel_bearings: Automotive bearings: wheel hub units, transmission bearings, and suspension systems.
items.linear_motion: Linear motion components: guide rails, roller and ball guides.
items.power_transmission: Power transmission systems: couplings, driveshafts, and chain drives.

company.title: INA Company
company.description: INA is a leading global manufacturer of bearings and linear motion systems. Founded in 1946 in Germany, the company is part of the Schaeffler Group and provides innovative solutions for mechanical engineering, the automotive industry, and other sectors.
company.assortment_intro: INA bearings are known for their reliability, high precision, and durability, making them essential in various industrial and automotive applications.

items.ball_bearings: Ball bearings: radial, thrust, and angular contact bearings.
items.roller_bearings: Roller bearings: cylindrical, tapered, and needle bearings.
items.plain_bearings: Plain bearings: bushing-type and spherical bearings.
items.linear_motion: Linear motion systems: guides, ball screws, and linear modules.
items.automotive_components: Automotive components: belt tensioners, pulleys, and engine parts.
